content.rendered:
80s GLAM NEW YEAR PARTY LOOKS

Happy early New Year and Happy Holidays to all my beautiful clients, friends, and family! I’m looking forward to welcoming 2019 in style. I feel like this year went by really fast, but I’m really excited to see all the magical things to come in 2019. I think it’s important to always keep moving forward, focus on the positive, and always keep faith in yourself and others. What better way to celebrate the New Year than with an ultra cool dark ’80s glam look. Here are some of my top favorites. P.S. Don’t forget to book lash extensions appointment early to ring in the New Year looking stunning.

1: Earrings and Saint Laurent bag from FWRD.COM 2: To make a glam Lash Extensions Appointment Click Here (Book Early For The Holidays). 3: Find The Perfect Beauty Gifts and/or A Gift For Yourself Shop D’Lashes Beauty Here. 5: Both Looks From FWRD.COM 6: Red Lipstick is from D’Lashes..the perfect party shade! 7: Top bag is Alexander Wang. 8: Middle crystal earrings are from Revolve.com Happy New Year!

LOVE DIONNE
